param.name: riid
param.para: A reference to a desired IID.

param.name: ppv
param.para: The address of a pointer to the resource.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves whether an item supports a specified resource.

summary.para: Exposes methods to manipulate and query Shell item resources.
